oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Classy Apple project' to reduce the quality gab between suppley and demand of organic apples
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Bloksma, Joke
Zanen, Marleen
Jansonius, PieterJans
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Crop health, quality, protection
Fruit and berries
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: LBI has started a project (2001-2003) to explore and reduce the bottlenecks and obstacles to fruit quality in the various market sectors by working with fruit growers, traders, extension services and research institutes together.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Bloksma, Joke; Zanen, Marleen and Jansonius, PieterJans (2002) Classy Apple project' to reduce the quality gab between suppley and demand of organic apples. In: Boos, Markus (Ed.) Ecofruit - 10th International Conference on Cultivation Technique and Phytopathological Problems in Organic Fruit-Growing and Viticulture. Proceedings to the Conference from 4th to 7th Feb. 2002 at Weinsberg/Germany, pp. 202-203.
